column2:
ben %>% 
  group_by(activity) %>% 
  arrange(date) %>% 
  mutate(cum_ben = cumsum(beneficiaries)) %>%
  mutate(activity = substr(activity, 0, 45)) %>%
  nest(-implementing_partners) %$%
  walk2(data, implementing_partners, save_line_charts)

All elements of `...` must be named.
Did you want `data = c(date, implementing_partner_type, state, township, village_ward_town, 
    location, admin1_pcode, admin3_pcode, activity, activity_status, 
    hrp_indicator, disaggregation, beneficiaries, cum_ben)`?
